subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
World Series
lead_paragraph: Fans at Game 3 snapped up standing-room-only tickets that allowed them to soak up the atmosphere even if their views were sometimes obstructed and their legs grew tired.
snippet: Fans at Game 3 snapped up standing-room-only tickets that allowed them to soak up the atmosphere even if their views were sometimes obstructed and their legs grew tired.
